Halberd of Vigilance is one of the Halberd Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Halberd of Vigilance is a powerful enchanted halberd that empowers reaction attacks (like the ones made with Sentinel) by giving advantage on the attack, it also makes detection easier with a +1 bonus and advantage to perception checks. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain special Actions while holding it.

A variant of this halberd's design was thrown out in the early stages of development by its forgemaster. This was because the halberd kept expressing itself. 'ALARM!' it would shriek in peril. 'POTENCY FILLS ME LIKE A SONG OF HOPE!' it roared in triumph.

BG3 Halberd of Vigilance Information
